TypeSignature.Value: public class Tuple<T1> : IComparable, System.Collections.IStructuralComparable, System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable

.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit Tuple`1<T1> extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IStructuralComparable, class System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable, class System.IComparable
Public Class Tuple(Of T1) Implements IComparable, IStructuralComparable, IStructuralEquatable
generic <typename T1> public ref class Tuple : IComparable, System::Collections::IStructuralComparable, System::Collections::IStructuralEquatable
type Tuple<'T1> = class interface IStructuralEquatable interface IStructuralComparable interface IComparable

typeparam.name: T1
typeparam.span: Tuple 之唯一元件的型別。

span.span: The type of the tuple's only component.
Represents a 1-tuple, or singleton.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Tuple 是具有特定數量和值序列的資料結構。A tuple is a data structure that has a specific number and sequence of values. 類別代表 1-tuple 或單一值，也就是 tuple，其中含有單一元件。The class represents a 1-tuple, or singleton, which is a tuple that has a single component. 單一值相對很少用於應用程式開發。A singleton is used comparatively rarely in application development. 您可以具現化藉由呼叫物件建構函式或靜態方法。You can instantiate a object by calling either the constructor or the static method. 您可以擷取 tuple 的單一元件的值使用的唯讀執行個體屬性。You can retrieve the value of the tuple's single component by using the read-only instance property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您也可以使用靜態方法，而不需要明確指定其元件的類型執行個體化 1 tuple 物件。You can also use the static method to instantiate a 1-tuple object without having to explicitly specify the type of its component. 下列範例會使用方法來具現化類型的元件是 1-tuple 。The following example uses the method to instantiate a 1-tuple whose component is of type . span.span: if the current instance is equal to the specified object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `obj`參數會被視為等於目前的執行個體，在下列情況下：The `obj` parameter is considered to be equal to the current instance under the following conditions: - 它是物件。It is a object. - 其單一元件是類型的與目前的執行個體相同。Its single component is of the same type as the current instance. - 其單一元件是等於目前的執行個體。Its single component is equal to that of the current instance. 是否相等由每個元件的預設物件相等比較子決定。Equality is determined by the default object equality comparer for each component. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫方法來比較物件，其元件為具有三個值元件具有下列特性的物件：The following example calls the method to compare a object whose component is a value with three objects whose components have the following characteristics: - 相同類型 () 和相同的值。Same type () and same value. - 相同類型 ()，但不同的值。Same type (), but different value. - 不同的型別 ()，但相同的值。Different type (), but same value. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`1.Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`1.equals/cs/equals1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`1.Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`1.equals/vb/equals1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以判斷的型別元件中有兩種：You can determine the type of the component in one of two ways: - 藉由呼叫`GetType`方法所傳回的值屬性。By calling the `GetType` method on the value that is returned by the property. - 藉由擷取物件，代表物件，並擷取第一個項目所傳回的陣列從其方法。By retrieving the object that represents the object, and retrieving the first element from the array that is returned by its method. 此範例說明這兩種方法。The example illustrates both approaches. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示兩個 singleton 和其元件的相關資訊。The following example displays information about two singletons and their components. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`1.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`1.item1/cs/item1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`1.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`1.item1/vb/item1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 System.Collections.IStructuralComparable.CompareTo(object other, class System.Collections.IComparer comparer) cil managed
Function CompareTo (other As Object, comparer As IComparer) As Integer Implements IStructuralComparable.CompareTo

param.name: other
param.span: 要與目前執行個體比較的物件。

span.span: An object to compare with the current instance.

param.name: comparer
param.span: 提供自訂規則進行比較的物件。

span.span: An object that provides custom rules for comparison.

summary.span: 使用指定的比較子將目前的 物件和指定的物件進行比較，並且傳回一個整數，表示目前的物件在排序順序中位於指定之物件的前面、後面還是相的位置。

span.span: Compares the current object to a specified object by using a specified comparer, and returns an integer that indicates whether the current object is before, after, or in the same position as the specified object in the sort order.

returns.span: 帶正負號的整數，可指出此執行個體以及排序次序中 的相對位置，如下表所示。

span.span: A signed integer that indicates the relative position of this instance and in the sort order, as shown in the following table.

item.description: 這個執行個體位於 之前。
這個執行個體和 的排序位置相同。
這個執行個體位於 之後。
This instance and have the same position in the sort order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然可以直接呼叫這個方法，但是最常呼叫此方法集合排序方法，包含了參數來排序集合的成員。Although this method can be called directly, it is most commonly called by collection sorting methods that include parameters to order the members of a collection. 例如，由呼叫方法和方法具現化所使用的物件建構函式。For example, it is called by the method and the method of a object that is instantiated by using the constructor. > [!CAUTION] > 方法僅供用於排序作業。The method is intended for use in sorting operations. 此外，它不應該使用時比較的主要目的是要判斷兩個物件是否相等。It should not be used when the primary purpose of a comparison is to determine whether two objects are equal. 若要判斷兩個物件是否相等，請呼叫方法。To determine whether two objects are equal, call the method. ## Examples 下列範例會定義泛型類別，名為`DescendingComparer`實作介面。The following example defines a generic class named `DescendingComparer` that implements the interface. `DescendingComparer` 排序中藉由反轉為特定類型的預設比較子所傳回的值遞減而不以遞增順序物件。`DescendingComparer` sorts objects in descending rather than ascending order by reversing the value returned by the default comparer for a particular type. 泛型執行個體`DescendingComparer`類別接著會傳遞給方法來排序的陣列以遞減順序物件。An instance of the generic `DescendingComparer` class is then passed to the method to sort an array of objects in descending order. 請注意，此範例不會直接呼叫方法。Note that the example does not directly call the method. 這個方法會隱含地呼叫陣列中每個項目的方法。This method is called implicitly by the method for each element in the array. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`1.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`1.compareto/cs/compareto2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`1.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`1.compareto/vb/compareto2.vb#2)]

span.span: is not a object.

param.name: other
param.span: 與這個執行個體相互比較的物件。

span.span: The object to compare with this instance.

param.name: comparer
param.span: 物件，定義要用來評估這兩個物件是否相等的方法。

span.span: An object that defines the method to use to evaluate whether the two objects are equal.

summary.span: 傳回值，這個值表示依據指定的比較方法，目前的 物件是否等於指定的物件。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether the current object is equal to a specified object based on a specified comparison method.

returns.span: 如果目前的執行個體和指定的物件相等，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current instance is equal to the specified object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 才實作會呼叫`other`不是`null`，而且如果它可以是成功轉換 （C# 中） 或 （在 Visual Basic) 轉換成其單一元件是目前的執行個體與相同類型的物件。The implementation is called only if `other` is not `null`, and if it can be successfully cast (in C#) or converted (in Visual Basic) to a object whose single component is of the same type as the current instance. 方法會傳遞元件目前執行個體和元件物件所代表`other`參數。The method is passed the component of the current instance and the component of the object represented by the `other` parameter. ## Examples 下列範例會定義視為兩個浮點數的值相等，如果它們是大約等於彼此 （也就是說，如果一個值是在其他.01%） 的實作。The following example defines an implementation that considers two floating-point values to be equal if they are approximately equal to each other (that is, if one value is within .01 percent of the other). [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`1.Equals#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`1.equals/cs/equals2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`1.Equals#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`1.equals/vb/equals2.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable.GetHashCode(class System.Collections.IEqualityComparer comparer) cil managed
Function GetHashCode (comparer As IEqualityComparer) As Integer Implements IStructuralEquatable.GetHashCode

param.name: comparer
param.span: 其 方法可以計算目前 物件之雜湊碼的物件。

span.span: An object whose method calculates the hash code of the current object.

summary.span: 使用指定的計算方法，計算目前 物件的雜湊碼。

span.span: Calculates the hash code for the current object by using a specified computation method.

returns.span: 32 位元帶正負號的整數雜湊碼。

span.span: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 方法只會包裝呼叫`comparer`物件的實作。The method simply wraps a call to the `comparer` object's implementation. 用來計算雜湊程式碼的演算法應該會傳回相同的雜湊程式碼，其中兩個會被視為相等的物件。The algorithm used to compute the hash code should return the same hash code for two objects that are considered to be equal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 這個方法會提供實作類別。This method provides the implementation for the class. 雖然可以直接呼叫的方法，但是最常呼叫此方法的排序方法，例如集合的預設多載和，若要排序之集合的成員。Although the method can be called directly, it is most commonly called by the default overloads of collection sorting methods, such as and , to order the members of a collection. > [!CAUTION] > 方法僅供用於排序作業。The method is intended for use in sorting operations. 此外，它不應該使用時比較的主要目的是要判斷兩個物件是否相等。It should not be used when the primary purpose of a comparison is to determine whether two objects are equal. 若要判斷兩個物件是否相等，請呼叫方法。To determine whether two objects are equal, call the method. 方法會使用預設物件比較子。The method uses the default object comparer. ## Examples 下列範例會建立其元件是的 singleton 的陣列值。The following example creates an array of singletons whose component is a value. 它顯示每個 tuple 元件的值未排序的順序，排序陣列，並再依排序順序中顯示的值。It displays the value of each tuple component in unsorted order, sorts the array, and then displays the values in sorted order. 請注意，此範例不會直接呼叫方法。Note that the example does not directly call the method. 這個方法會隱含地呼叫陣列中每個項目的方法。This method is called implicitly by the method for each element in the array.
